channel.title: Posts on RPorio for Factorio
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on RPorio for Factorio

item.title: RPorio: is it a good idea?
item.description: So I thought it would be good to have some sort of journal on this project to here it’s. Using Hugo to make a silly website as a blog and possibly wiki for this thing call RPGorio. So what is RPGorio and is it a good idea? As of writting RPGorio does not exist yet, but hopefully one day it will be a fun Factorio role playing mod! Question: ‘But Mobius… why does Factorio need and RP elements?
